SELECT hi.id, hi.address, hi.building_id AS buildingId, hi.number, hi.floor, hi.usage_area AS usageArea, hi.surface_area AS surfaceArea, hi.nature, hi.rooms, hi.staff_id AS staffId, hi.owner_id AS ownerId, hi.buyer, hi.create_date AS createDate, oi.name, oi.phone, oi.id_number AS idNumber, bi.name AS buildName, bi.address AS buildAddress, bi.street, bi.community, bi.usage_area AS buildUsageArea, bi.surface_area AS buildSurfaceArea, bi.type, bi.rooms AS buildRooms, bi.units, bi.layers, bi.images, wi.name AS workerName, wi.phone AS workerPhone, wi.image AS workerImage FROM houses_info hi LEFT JOIN building_info bi ON ( bi.id = hi.building_id ) LEFT JOIN owner_info oi ON ( oi.id = hi.owner_id ) LEFT JOIN worker_info wi ON (wi.id = hi.staff_id) WHERE 1 = 1
AND hi.address LIKE CONCAT('%',#{housesInfo.address},'%')
AND hi.nature = #{housesInfo.nature}
AND hi.buyer LIKE CONCAT('%',#{housesInfo.buyer},'%')
AND bi.community LIKE CONCAT('%',#{housesInfo.community},'%')
ORDER BY hi.create_date DESC

SELECT hi.id, hi.address, hi.building_id AS buildingId, hi.number, hi.floor, hi.usage_area AS usageArea, hi.surface_area AS surfaceArea, hi.nature, hi.rooms, hi.staff_id AS staffId, hi.owner_id AS ownerId, hi.buyer, bi.images FROM houses_info hi LEFT JOIN building_info bi ON ( bi.id = hi.building_id ) WHERE 1 = 1 AND hi.owner_id = #{ ownerId }

SELECT ci.* FROM consumption_info ci WHERE ci.houses_id = #{ housesId } AND DATE_FORMAT( concat( ci.`year`, '-', ci.`month`, '-', '01' ), '%Y-%m' ) = DATE_FORMAT( DATE_SUB( now(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH ), '%Y-%m')
SELECT ci.* FROM consumption_info ci WHERE ci.houses_id = #{ housesId } AND DATE_FORMAT( concat( ci.`year`, '-', ci.`month`, '-', '01' ), '%Y-%m' ) = DATE_FORMAT( now(), '%Y-%m')
SELECT COUNT( 1 ) AS num, CASE nature WHEN 1 THEN '住宅楼房' WHEN 2 THEN '社区用处' END AS nature FROM houses_info hi GROUP BY hi.nature

SELECT hi.id, hi.address, hi.building_id AS buildingId, hi.number, hi.floor, hi.usage_area AS usageArea, hi.surface_area AS surfaceArea, hi.nature, hi.rooms, hi.staff_id AS staffId, hi.owner_id AS ownerId, hi.buyer, hi.create_date AS createDate, oi.name, oi.phone, oi.id_number AS idNumber, bi.name AS buildName, bi.address AS buildAddress, bi.street, bi.community, bi.usage_area AS buildUsageArea, bi.surface_area AS buildSurfaceArea, bi.type, bi.rooms AS buildRooms, bi.units, bi.layers, bi.images, wi.name AS workerName, wi.phone AS workerPhone, wi.image AS workerImage, ri.id AS repairId, ri.repair_status AS repairStatus FROM houses_info hi LEFT JOIN building_info bi ON ( bi.id = hi.building_id ) LEFT JOIN owner_info oi ON ( oi.id = hi.owner_id ) LEFT JOIN worker_info wi ON (wi.id = hi.staff_id) LEFT JOIN repair_info ri ON (ri.houses_id = hi.id) AND ri.repair_status != 2 WHERE 1 = 1 AND oi.user_id = #{ userId }
